name: Random Bullshit
description:
This project is just for me to relax a bit. No deadline, no pressure to make something perfect, I just put whatever mechanisms I think would be fun. If you have an idea of what would be a fun feature, I encourage you to make a comment or discussion here, as I might add it! 

This is nowhere near to the final product as of now, and gets boring really fast, but don't worry, I'll keep adding content!
